sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LFDocumentContent</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Class which represents the LFDocumentContent</description>
        <name>LFDocumentContent</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LFDocumentContent = Class.create();
LFDocumentContent.prototype = {
    KEY_DELIMITER: "_",
    FIELD_DELIMITER: ": ",

    initialize: function(version, language, sysId, tableName, additionalParameters) {
        this.version = version;
        this.content = [];
        this.language = language;
        this.sysId = sysId;
        this.tableName = tableName;
        this.additionalParameters = additionalParameters;
        this.processedGroupNameLabels = {};
    },

    addElement: function(element) {
        this._validateElement(element);
        var groupNameLabelKey = element.getGroupName() + this.FIELD_DELIMITER + element.getLabel();
        var id = 1 + (this.processedGroupNameLabels.hasOwnProperty(groupNameLabelKey) ? this.processedGroupNameLabels[groupNameLabelKey] : 0);
        var elementId = (id > 1) ? (groupNameLabelKey + this.KEY_DELIMITER + id) : groupNameLabelKey;
        element.setId(elementId);
        this.processedGroupNameLabels[groupNameLabelKey] = id;
        this.content.push(element);
    },

    getVersion: function() {
        return this.version;
    },

    getElements: function() {
        return this.content;
    },

    getLanguage: function() {
        return this.language;
    },

    getSysId: function() {
        return this.sysId;
    },

    getTableName: function() {
        return this.tableName;
    },

    getAdditionalParameters: function() {
        return this.additionalParameters;
    },

    _validateElement: function(element) {
        if (!(element instanceof LFDocumentContentElement)) {
            var exceptionMapper = new LFExceptionMapper('INVALID_ELEMENT');
            exceptionMapper.throwException();
        }
    },

    type: 'LFDocumentContent'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-05-11 09:51:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2f6d3ba90f003010c0774ee7c8767e05</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LFDocumentContent</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Localization Framework" source="com.glide.localization_framework">a4dd193447720210cd4e1ce4316d4312</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2f6d3ba90f003010c0774ee7c8767e05</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-08-26 17:08:17</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
